meanings.definition: A woman in a position of authority or control.
meanings.sent1: The mistresses of the school ensured that all students followed the rules.
meanings.sent2: She was the mistresses of the company, making important decisions every day.
meanings.sent3: The mistresses of the playground organized fun games for everyone.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chess, the queen is the ultimate mistress of the board.
meanings.sent5: The mistresses of the castle commanded respect from all who entered.

meanings.definition: A woman who has a continuing sexual relationship with a man who is married to someone else.
meanings.sent1: The scandalous affair was exposed when his mistresses came forward.
meanings.sent2: She discovered her husband's mistresses through incriminating messages.
meanings.sent3: The mistresses in the soap opera added drama to the storyline.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume lingered in the room like a silent mistress of secrets.
meanings.sent5: The mistresses in the novel played a pivotal role in the protagonist's downfall.
